title: `spack install elemental` hangs with external openblas
body:
Summary

`spack install elemental blas=openblas` hangs on RHEL7 if external `openblas@0.2.20` is used. However, using external `intel-mkl@2018.0` works just fine, as does a spack-installed `openblas@0.2.20`.

### Expected Result

`spack install elemental` works with external OpenBLAS.

### Actual Result

`spack install elemental` applies a CMake patch for version 0.87.7, and then reaches "Installing CMakePackage", and never seems to actually run CMake.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install elemental
```

### Information on your system

The system is `rztopaz` at LLNL, running RHEL7, with the following `packages.yaml`:

```console
packages:
  all:
    compiler: [intel@18.0.1, intel, gcc, pgi, clang, xl, nag]
    providers:
      mpi: [mvapich2]
      blas: [openblas, netlib-lapack, intel-mkl]
      lapack: [openblas, netlib-lapack, intel-mkl]
  # openblas:
  #   paths:
  #     openblas@0.2.20: /usr/
  #   buildable: False
  netlib-lapack:
    paths:
      netlib-lapack@3.4.2: /usr/
    buildable: False
  intel-mkl:
    paths:
      intel-mkl@2018.0: /usr/tce/packages/mkl/mkl-2018.0/
    buildable: False
  mvapich2:
    paths:
      mvapich2@2.2%intel@18.0.1: /usr/tce/packages/mvapich2/mvapich2-2.2-intel-18.0.1/
    buildable: False
  mpich:
    buildable: False
  openmpi:
    buildable: False
  intel-mpi:
    buildable: False
  spectrum-mpi:
    buildable: False
  intel-parallel-studio:
    buildable: False
  cmake:
    paths:
      cmake@2.8.12.2: /usr/
    buildable: False
  pkg-config:
    paths:
      pkg-config@0.27.1 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64: /usr/bin/
    buildable: False
  m4:
    paths:
      m4@1.4.16 arch=linux-rhe17-x86_64: /usr/bin/
    buildable: False
  graphviz:
    paths:
      graphviz@2.30.1: /usr/
    buildable: False
  perl:
    paths:
      perl@5.16.3: /usr/
    buildable: False
  hdf5:
    paths:
      hdf5@1.8.18 %intel@18.0.1 ~mpi +cxx +fortran +hl +shared: /usr/tce/packages/hdf5/hdf5-serial-1.8.18-intel-18.0.1/
      hdf5@1.8.18 %intel@18.0.1 +mpi ~cxx +fortran +hl +shared ^mvapich2@2.2: /usr/tce/packages/hdf5/hdf5-parallel-1.8.18-intel-18.0.1-mvapich2-2.2/
    buildable: False
  bison:
    paths:
      bison@3.0.4: /usr/
    buildable: False
  boost:
    paths:
      boost@1.66.0 %intel@18.0.1 +atomic +chrono ~clanglibcpp +date_time +exception +filesystem +graph ~icu +iostreams +locale +log +math +mpi +program_options +python +regex +serialization +shared +signals +system  +test +thread +timer +wave ^mvapich@2.2: /usr/tce/packages/b\
oost/boost-1.66.0-mvapich2-2.2-intel-18.0.1/
    buildable: False
  doxygen:
    paths:
      doxygen@1.8.5: /usr/
    buildable: False
  netcdf:
    paths:
      netcdf@4.4.1.1 %intel@18.0.1: /usr/tce/packages/netcdf/netcdf-4.4.1.1-intel-18.0.1/
    buildable: False
  bzip2:
    paths:
      bzip2@1.0.6: /usr
    buildable: False
```
